channel.title: 2024-11-22 21:30:00 -0500 -0500 on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2024-11-22 21:30:00 -0500 -0500 on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 22 Nov 2024 21:30
item.description: Spent a good few hours yesterday and ported my garmin data over to this site here. It’s turned out better than my wordpress plugin and is way simpler to manage. I’ve still got quite a few tweaks to do but I’m super happy with how this has turned out!
item.content:encoded: Spent a good few hours yesterday and ported my garmin data over to this site here. It’s turned out better than my wordpress plugin and is way simpler to manage. I’ve still got quite a few tweaks to do but I’m super happy with how this has turned out!
